constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 59 (Thursday, April 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. McCLAIN:
H.R. 2330.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H1707]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

title: To provide that the Secretary of the Interior may not use COVID-19 as a basis for restricting or limiting outdoor recreational use of land or water administered by the National Park Service, and for other purposes.
